name: Artist Color Pencil Longwear Lip Liner
about: What it is: A long-wear lip liner that applies effortlessly to shape and enhance lips with a richly pigmented and creamy formula..Formulation Type: Lip Liner..Benefits: Long wearing..Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: The comfortable matte texture is easy to blend and feels weightless on lips. The precise, wooden pencil guarantees sharp lines and a smooth, long-lasting application with no feathering. You can use this lip liner as your perfect nude alone or pair with your favorite gloss or lipstick.
ingredients: Mica, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Stearyl Dimethicone, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Octadecene, Cera Microcristallina (Microcrystalline Wax), Kaolin, Synthetic Wax, Polyethylene, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, [+/- Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides)]...Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a MAKE UP FOR EVER product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging to ensure that the ingredients are suitable for your personal use.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Trace the Cupid's bow of the lip, ensuring the highpoints are balanced..-Define the center of the bottom lip in parallel with the bow of the lip..-Outline corners of the lips, then trace along the natural lip line to connect all lines..-Sharpen as needed for clean and precise lines....Pro Tip:.-To create volume, connect the outer corners to the centers of the lips..-To reduce volume, connect from the center of the lips to the outer corners.

shades.shade_descriptor: Warm Chocolate Brown (Not suitable for use on eyes)
Medium Berry (Not suitable for use on eyes)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love how pretty this is! it’s the perfect brownish-red that i love, i’ve also used it on my waterline and i loved how it looked!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw a lip combo on TikTok with this liner and a brown lip treatment. I hate bright reds and I can’t decide whether I like a cool or warm tone red. I also am so picky with lip colors. I don’t like a burgundy or maroon shade, I don’t like an orangey firetruck red, or a blue leaning red. I love using browns and pinks on my lips. But I had a holiday party coming up and I wanted a festive lip. After seeing that video on TikTok, it looked gorgeous! Immediately purchased. I have to say, this is my favorite red. I even wear it just for a regular day. It can be packed on for a more pigmented look, or lightly applied for a subtle flush on the lips. I always pair this with a brown gloss or lip treatment. Plus, it’s a makeup forced lip liner - you can’t go wrong!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Goes on so beautifully and blends so well the shade is to die for

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the girlies on tiktok were not lying this really is the perfect pinky brown, and super smooth as well! however the first time i put it on the top partially chipped and a lip liner priced at $20 should not be chipping in my opinion, but it’s cute!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wherever Walnut is quite warm for sure. It’s pretty and I know it’s super popular - nice creamy formula but for those of us who prefer a cooler toned neutral for nude lip this isn’t for us. I’ll try a diff colour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After much consideration… I bite the sticker shock on the price, and I bought it! Now… don’t be fooled, I’ve paid BIG price on lip products, but this one is NOT worth the hype. Nice formula as with all @makeupforever but the staying power is not the best I’ve worked with
It’s gorgeous 10/10 recommend the color is a mix of like pink and brown idk even how to explain it but omg love love love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just love the shade, and it’s very smooth. Perfeft for brown girls.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite! The formula is smooth, creamy, and easy to blend out with my fingers. It’s super versatile and can be used on the eyes, lips, and even for faux freckles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I know this is one of the most popular shades and it is pretty, but it’s not for me - or anyone who prefers a cooler toned liner. This turns more warm. I have a rosier lip colour and am not a fan of the warmth of this one. Creamy product, easily a lipstick not just a liner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product and I use this lip liner every day! Definitely worth your money and the shade 600 is my favorite! This lip liner glides on so easily and is so creamy! Love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great liner, love the color, very natural MLBB, it could last a bit longer but I will repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a pretty color, stays on for a while. It goes with so many lip sticks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First time trying this blend of lip liner. I’m so glad I did! It’s easy to blend or go more bold along the lips for a defined look. It’s a gorgeous color as well! Looked great on my complexion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing this it what the kalogeras sisters wear, I like to smudge it and also use a clear gloss over it is perfect for all seasons

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: glides on smoothly, such a pretty color for medium/ olive skin tone. love to use it with a gloss. my fav.

I love this color. It’s absolutely beautiful. I have received several compliments since I started wearing it. I use it as my all over color and just put a semi sheer gloss on top. I really like the formula, it’s not to dry but it doesn’t feel like it will slide off easily either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Two stars feels a bit generous. It says it's a creamy formula, but doesn't blend at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lip liner so much. So creamy and long lasting. I loveeee it so much

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s amazing it glides on perfect and the color is gorgeous it’s a pretty pinkish nude color

reviews.review_title: Wish I could say I loved it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color and I really wanted to love it, as it was just the right shade for me and I’d heard that these were some of the better lip liners out there, but I had to return this unfortunately. I was looking for something that looked like my lips but slightly darker, and this was it. Goes on smoothly, and the liner isn’t too soft that I have to worry it’ll break, and not too hard where I feel like I’m poking myself every time I go to apply. However, the lasting power was just not there and it would smudge easily if I went to apply gloss over it and just throughout the day, just a few hours in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipliner! Perfect for cool toned makeup, I use it every time I go out and get a lot of compliments on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this color and I use it as a lip liner and have used it on my cheeks in a pinch. Doesn’t dry out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Endless Cacao is so versatile. I have used it as lip liner, contour on my nose, eye liner, freckles. So good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lip liner. It doesn’t drag or pull, but it’s also not so creamy that it like wears off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After seeing this liner trending on social media like crazy I decided to purchase in wherever walnut . Love the shade it’s gorgeous however , I did get on sale and the pencil is extremely dry . I was shocked . Think I’ll exchange it for same thing and see if perhaps I received an older one . Love the color though !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my absolute favorite lipliner. i had to reorder another one cs i lost mine 😭

reviews.review_title: The best lip liner I’ve ever used
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best lip liners I’ve ever used goes on like butter and is such a beautiful color and lasts all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t expect to love this as much as I do. A really subtle product - perfect for “no make-up make up” - and really simple and creamy when applying. In my opinion, the best thing about it is the ability to also use it as eyeliner. I haven’t had to sharpen it yet, which is when I feel lip liners can disappoint but I love it so far!

reviews.review_title: Great lip liner with buttery formula!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The texture of the lip liner is so buttery, no tugging or discomfort on the lips. I enjoy the color. I have a medium to tan skin tone and the edges of my lips are slightly more pigmented. This color is fairly close to the shade of the darker parts of my lips so if you are of a similar complexion I would recommend purchasing a color that is a bit darker, but that is just my personal preference. Overall very happy with my purchase.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful color but the tip broke off.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color and very creamy. Maybe too creamy as the tip broke off twice as I was swatching it on my hand. Wouldn’t repurchase without it being on sale.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This my favorite lipliner ever! This shade goes with any lip combo. Definitely recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I spent $24 on this lip liner and every time I go to sharpen it, the tip breaks off. 4-5 times in a row. what a waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The shade is a beautiful, earthy tone that complements a wide range of lip colors, making it perfect for everyday use. The pencil glides on smoothly, providing easy & precise application. Overall, it's a reliable & high quality lip liner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the shades are just beautiful. i have anywhere caffeine and wherever walnut and they are both my favorite shades of lip liner. very creamy but not as long lasting as expected, especially after drinking liquids. i usually set with powder.

reviews.review_title: Holiday set made me a believer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got the holiday 5 pack set which included wherever walnut, limitless brown and anywhere caffeine and I fell in love with these liners. I always felt like it wasn’t justifiable to spend so much on just a liner but the formula, the colours, the blend ability and ability to use these on other parts of the face really make it worth it. I will definitely purchase again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Shade 606 is perfect, a warm nude that complements any look. The formula is creamy but sets incredibly well, and I can wear it alone or pair it with a gloss. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is by far the best lip liner i’ve ever tried! it’s so creamy, long lasting, and a really beautiful color. will be purchasing again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like it. Long-lasting, good quality, nice color. I definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this pencil I use it for everything, lipliner , eyeliner , nose nose contour , even my check bones . This is my second time . Worth ￼it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So so beautiful, long lasting, and perfectly creamy! I'm obsessed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip liner lasts sooooo long and is beautiful on my lips. It pairs well with any lip gloss and comes in many different shades that are all pretty. I putting it on every morning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok I’ve seen a lot influencers use this and I finally bought it and let me say I’m so glad I did! It’s like a versatile liner to use with so many lip products

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip liner. Bought it on a whim because I read other rave reviews. I’ve never reviewed a product until now. Application was flawless and it lasted all. night. long. Several drinks later and still slays. Even my bf mentioned how nice my lips look. Buy. It.  slaying

reviews.review_title: Best color, bad longevity (not the worst)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the my favorite lipliner color. I couldn’t find others with the same nude that I love. Very creamy and smooth to draw BUT it’s not very ‘long wear’. It would be all gone within 1.5 hours after I only drink (with or without straw). I didn’t even eat. I’ll still use and repurchase it until I find another one that last longer with the same color. I found the nudes from other brands are either too pink, too brown or too pale.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wear this when I play squash and while at the gym, and it doesn’t smudge at all (which is very impressive given that I sweat a lot from my upper lip area). Its the only lip liner I’ve used that lasts after eating

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wanting to try this for so long.  So disappointed.  The formula is dry and tugs on my lips.  much better liners at the drug store.  natasha denona lip liners are nice too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect everyday shade. Truly a my-lips-but-better color for me. Creamy formula like a lipstick, but great for lining the Cupid's bow with easy precision. It’s a staple for me now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wherever Walnut is a great tone of nude without being too warm. It has become a go-to for me.  Boundless Berry is a nice pink. They have only a moderate wear time, but are still a good lip pencil.  There are others on the market that are more long-wearing like PML.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been hearing about these liners for ages but just now tried them and get the hype. The most noticeable aspect is how creamy the formula is and the application just glides on. It feels like a lipstick going on but with precision. Wherever Walnut is the perfect pinky brown shade that would suit many skin tones. The shade gives the perfect my lips but better' color so you can get away with overlining and still looking natural. The only lip liner I would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a perfect brown for my medium skin tone. It blends very well and is perfect for creating ombré lips. Will definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Cute product, love the color and it is for sure creamy and blendable. It doesn’t last that long though. Wouldn’t recommend if you’re really going for something super durable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wherever walnut is truly a perfect shade. Super creamy and glides on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely beautiful color. It is perfect for an everyday look and for over-lining. Lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this color on my lips along with wherever walnut, it’s the perfect combo. CHEFS KISS

reviews.review_text: It’s a great neutral lip liner. I have used it with multiple glosses and looks good every time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to especially for fall!! I love it so much Ive repurchased multiple times

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Applies easy, was cheap but price jumped a lot, lasts, blendable, soft, does not sharpen well tho

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this! The colour looks great. However it does smear easily. But I will continue to buy this and from this brand.

reviews.review_title: Dehydrating lip liner, good color though
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Extremely drying. Returned after 1 use.  Nice color, though I don't like the feel of the pencil.  Not for me.

reviews.review_title: The best lip liner I have used!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product sooo much! Ever since I got this product it has been my favorite. I am also a Sabina Carpenter fan and when I found out she used this I knew I needed it and now I LOVE IT!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I couldn't decide between Anywhere Caffeine, and Wherever Walnut, so I purchased them both. Both colors are absolute winners!! Although I have been blessed with naturally very full lips, at 47, they have lost a little of their fullness. This lip liner adds an incredible fullness!! I tend to have very dry lips, so like another reviewer, I use this liner with Summer Fridays Lip Balm for an easy, every day look. I love Anywhere Caffeine with either Iced Latte or Hot Cocoa S F., and Wherever Walnut with either Vanilla or Pink Sugar S.F. Wherever Walnut also looks good with Charlotte Tilbury Pillowtalk Original lipstick! I do find that the staying power is less when paired with a gloss, but that's to be expected. it definitely lasts a long time with lipstick. This lip liner is an absolute winner!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite lip pencil. The color matches neutral tones as well as some more pronounced browinsh-reds. It also lasts forever. Make up Forever!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this lipliner. I am not sure if i just got a ad lipliner but mine has tiny rocks or some sort of roughness to the lipliner. I have sharpened it, tried to pick the rocks out but its like its throughout the entire lipliner. So it scratches my lips when I apply it. Not a smooth application, leaves my lips feeling like they are chapped from getting scraped. I gave it 2 stars just because I love the color. I will be sticking with m MAC and Makeup by Mario lipliners

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color & should suit all skin tones! It’s my everyday lip liner. It could use a bit more staying power, but I’ve yet to try setting it with powder, so I’m sure that would help.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first lip liner. I’ve had that glides on easily and stays on for a good amount of time. The colour is perfect for fall. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect universal product in a ideal nude shade for both lips and contour, etc.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: formula stays, perfect pinky nude! this is my every day shade

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loveeee this color! I have 3 other shades and by far this is my favorite! I also love the formula, it can last for hours!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve use Charlotte Tilbury’s and other lip liners. This is my favorite so far, it’s perfect and this shade is my favorite. 😍 ￼

reviews.review_text: Good pigmentation, the color is pretty, I had big expectations for this product and didn’t even disappointed me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This shade, matched my lip colour. I was hoping it would be a bit darker. Other than that, cream smooth consistency and very pigmented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect lip liner color ✨ obsessed!!! This is my new favorite and will be a staple in my lip liner collection

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the creaminess of this formula! The color is great for fall. If you have darker lips, this will show up beautiful. Don't hesitate!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this liner in wherever walnut shade for years now and I will keep repurchasing. It is great for slight overlining your lips, it matches my natural lip color perfectly being a tad darker just perfect. Add lip gloss and that’s it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I WAS NOT IMPRESSED with the liner and the formulae. From the reviews most people say it glides like butter. I guess it’s the colour I pick. I’m a black girl and I wanted to try anywhere caffein. WORSE MISTAKE EVER!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Don't know how I feel about these, they have nice shades but I wish they were creamier for the lips. I think i prefer this eyeliner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice lip pencil and I find it lasts a while on my lips. I love the color 606 Wherever Walnut

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product!! Of all the lip products I own, I would always reach for this. Its so nice and smooth and works perfectly with anything. I love to pair it with my Summer Fridays or even Aquaphor🫶

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I struggle finding lip liners that go with everything and honestly, this is so beautiful!!! Literally my go to lip liner bcs of how versatile it is. The actual lip pencil though smells like an actual no. 2 pencil so gave me a headache but i just sprayed it with some perfume and everything was fine! literally my fave!!that

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Long lasting and lovely colors. I wish there were more color options.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A must have lipliner!  The most perfect shade of a mauve like brown!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This pencil is so beautiful and goes on nicely. I love the color it matches perfectly with hourglass lipgloss in shade desire and it’s just gorgeous. It doesn’t feel drying and it is smooth. Stays on nicely too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This color is so flattering - a true “your lips, but better.” It applies very easily and looks beautiful layered with a clear gloss. It holds up well to being sharpened and would last a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Make up for ever is by far the best brand for lip liners. They’re not dry at all yet not too creamy. I’m obsessed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The most perfect brown/red tones especially for a medium-dark skin tones! After even eating ramen lol it still held up and didn’t fade! 100/10 love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: when I start using it it was so helpful  because I have drak skin and it make my look complet so good buy

reviews.review_title: my gateway product to a lip liner obsession.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my first high-end western lip liner and i was not disappointed. it was “love at first swipe” for me. SO easy to use. creamy, but not TOO creamy where it’s slipping and sliding. it’s not dry like the ones i’ve tried from AOU cosmetics. i’m glad i got this instead of the waterproof one which apparently dries out if you leave it uncapped. i like this wooden pencil type better. it’s become a staple in my makeup bag and i’m excited to try anywhere caffeine next. :) and yes, i was influenced by sabrina carpenter lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has quickly become a new favorite along side the Charlotte Tilbury liners. I got these in two colors, wherever walnut + anywhere caffeine and they're both stunning. The formula is long lasting and a harder formula which I prefer because it really stays and lasts longer.

reviews.review_title: More cool/neutral tones please, Make Up Forever.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: With the exception of Endless Cacao, ALL of these pull VERY warm. It's bad. Please try a tester before you buy!  The new extreme pencils share this problem.  The quality is impeccable. (Comparable to MAC...why is it so difficult to a find good range of quality liners in this day and age?  There is no excuse.)so it's a real shame.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 604 Up & Down Tan - Medium Warm Nude
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you love old 90’s lip look this is it!! So creamy, so smooth it glides on your lips. Wish would be last longing but I guess all lipliners are the same. Definitely will be getting more colors. I love the fact you can use on all your face, I’ve also been using it as an eyeshadow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The product quality is real good, i have other shades too. But this shade is not so good for my brown skin tone. I feel like there’s a difference in the image as compared to what i actually got.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the colors of the liners and love how easy they glide on! My only complaint is that it barely lasts 2 hours on me when I wear it with a gloss :( I will try the waterproof version next!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this Artist Colour Pencil over a year ago in the colour 500 Boundless Bisque. I've been using it everyday. it's not a bad product but definitely not worth $32. I bought it at the time because I was needing a nude eyeliner pencil and there was a free gift which I wanted and had to spend over $30 to get it so I ended up picking up this product. I feel like you can get the same at the drug store or even better for a fraction of the price. But yeah it's just an Okay product. I won't be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 10/10, no notes. Its the perfect color, perfect formlua, perfect everything. I have used it until it was a little nub.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 610 Versatile Chestnut - Warm Chocolate Brown (Not suitable for use on eyes)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Highly recommended this lip liner or any shade from this line!! Very pigmented and easy to work with 💖

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love makeup forever lip lines. This is the perfect reddish brown on me and I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The BEST lip liner to ever exist! This lip liner applies on so smoothly, has the prettiest shades, and is super pigmented. I love this lip liner so much and will be repurchasing in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a pretty color and goes on my lips like butter!!! I almost feel like Makeup Forver is incapable of creating a bad product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I jumped on the bandwagon a little late but I LOVE this lip liner color!! I have a few MUFE Liners from long ago & have always loved their formula. This color is perfection! I also have Wherever Walnut which is also a phenomenal shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this color, just as good as wherever walnut but brighter. Both are must have my lips but better liners! smooth and easy applicator! lasts well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The best pencil liner that I test ever. Its soft, the best color. I really lovit!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It really does last a while! The only thing is it was a lot warmer than expected😅

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in the latest lip kit from Sephora and I was excited because those are what got me into lip liners in the first place. I’m only giving it 4 stars because I really don’t like actual lip pencils that I have to sharpen and prefer the mechanical ones I can just twist up. Aside from my personal packaging preferences, the formula of this is fantastic. It is super creamy and easy to apply. I like to fill my lips partially in with the liner and use a lighter lip color on the inner part and this liner has the perfect formula for doing that. I wouldn’t describe this as being a rose brown though. It’s definitely more of a neutral brown tone when applied. Could just be how it shows up on me, but I love this shade regardless. It pairs really well with a lot of my lip products. I was using the Rare Beauty liner until it broke so I have no complaints about the price. You definitely get what you pay for. This liner has incredible staying power and even if whatever product I pair it with wears off this is still there and I still look like my lips are done. Definitely recommend this, just wish there was a mechanical version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried everything to get this to last on my eyes. It literally disappears within hours. I have it in the most popular lip colors and love it as lip liner. I should have sent the eye pencil (a dark brown) back, it was useless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wherever Walnut is my every day liner. There is no brand that compares to makeup forever when it comes to lip liners! Smooth and precise application, long wear, amazing range of colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have the Berry and the Forever Walnut color and love them. I am on my second Walnut shade and plan to buy Caffeine next. Something about them makes them glide on smooth without smearing. The point is not too thick or too sharp; it's just right. Very pleased with Make Up For Ever lipliners and how they wear.

reviews.review_title: it’s a must have in my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: loved the colour and didn’t make my lips dry. looked great on any person that tried it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally a staple for me. It is pricier which I don't love and I 100% bought it because it was trending online but the colour is perfect for my skin tone and it lasts a fairly long time on me. I really like lip liners that you have to manually sharpen (might be controversial) but I just find they tend to stay better on my lips. The drier formulas work better for me and are much easier to layer on top if it fades without getting thick and cakey. Love this lip liner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the shade anywhere caffeine and I absolutely love it! I think a brown lip on tan skin is timeless and this shade is perfect for any time of the year. I apply it in the morning and it stays on all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The pencil is Super creamy and the color is so  beautiful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have bought these in many shades. This is my latest. I don't like that MUFE has designated them as lip or eye pencils. I liked having them all be just artist pencils, because my favorite one to line my lips is actually Boundless Bisque, which is now sold as an eye pencil. Not gonna stop me, it's a small thing that I preferred the way they used to name them. While this is not my favorite shade, I do like the pencil itself. It's soft enough to not pull, and not any softer. I like that it's not so creamy that it's can smudge. That slightly drier consistency is easier for lipliner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s so versatile I use it on my nose, contour eyeliner, sometimes freckles and of course, my lips to outline. Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are expensive, but it is absolutely true that they stay on ALL day and I find myself going for this pencil more often than all of my other drugstore liners for that reason. Saving up to purchase some more, I'd like to get all of them eventually :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product . It last almost all day . I love the color too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this with a rare beauty eye brow gel and the eyebrow gel came in but this never came and they charged me 24 dollars for this when it never came in my package and I have tried contacting but  I haven’t gotten any responses

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin tone is quite light and cool so it’s pretty hard to find a pink lip liner that doesn’t look orangey on me. This particular shade is my perfect natural pink shade. It’s my lips, but better, I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Make Up For Ever Artist Color Pencil Extreme Waterproof Lip Liner lives up to its name with a highly waterproof formula that ensures long-lasting wear. It remains intact through meals and drinks, providing hours of vibrant color without smudging or feathering.  Color Range and Versatility: Available in a wide range of shades, from natural nudes to bold reds and deep plums, this lip liner offers options to complement various lip colors and preferences. It can be used alone for a matte lip look or paired with lipstick or gloss for added definition and longevity.  Smooth Application and Texture: The pencil glides on smoothly without tugging or pulling, thanks to its creamy texture. This makes it easy to achieve precise lines and contours around the lips, enhancing lip shape and preventing feathering.  Comfort and Feel: Despite its waterproof and long-lasting properties, the lip liner feels lightweight and comfortable on the lips. It does not dry out or settle into fine lines, maintaining a smooth and even finish throughout wear.  Packaging and Design: The pencil is designed for ease of use, with a retractable format that eliminates the need for sharpening. Its slim and sleek design makes it travel-friendly and convenient for touch-ups on the go.  Overall Experience: The Make Up For Ever Artist Color Pencil Extreme Waterproof Lip Liner is a versatile and reliable choice for those seeking a lip liner that combines long-lasting wear with ease of application. Its extensive shade range, smooth texture, and waterproof formula make it suitable for everyday use and special occasions alike, ensuring your lip color stays vibrant and defined throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing lip liner, perfect texture and colours. Not sure if the one i got was a bad batch cos it smells like mould as soon as i opened it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great color.  This liner matches with almost all neutral, light pink lipsticks that I use.  I do recommend buying it for an everyday liner.  It lasts for a long time.

reviews.review_title: A must- have in my routine

The huge down side is that it crumbles and I’ve had to sharpen it so frequently, I just bought it maybe 2 weeks ago and it’s almost half way sharpened. Tugs on both eyes and lips which leads to more crumbling and sometimes just breaks straight on its own after being sharpened.

I do wish it stayed on longer, I kind of feel like it doesn't stay put like my Pillow Talk by CT does. It's still one of my favorites though.

One of the best eye pencils  out there  Soo versatile and can be used for lips as well  Amazing

reviews.review_text: As someone who is new to lip liner, this pencil is honestly great. It’s so smooth going on. There is no dry, tugging feeling during application. Plus the color is such a your lips but better color. If you’re looking for a new lip liner to try or you’re a first timer like me, you’ve found the one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am a brown liner girlie, and this one is my new favorite. I’ve been using it for the past weeks with my red lip oil and it’s a perfect pair. It glides on smoothly and is super versatile. Included pictures below, with and without gloss. I

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely my favorite lip pencil! I use it every day and it makes my lips look so pretty and the color itself is pretty and I’ve been looking for another like it. It’s one of a kind !

reviews.review_title: Amazing doesn't even begin to describe...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So I think these have gone viral for good reason. I find that they work so well as lip liners and eye liners (the ones marked safe for eyes only). You can never go wrong with these, and I have them in all the colors.

reviews.review_title: A truly amazing product. Pillow talk comparable
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a lippie girl. I’ve tried so many liners. THIS IS THE ONE. I am telling you. I loved CT pillow talk for so long as it was “my lips but better”, but whereever walnut is even more natural but enhancing! I think I prefer it to pillow talk honestly. The formula is a perfect creamy blend that doesn’t feel like you can’t get a solid line but doesn’t feel like a pencil crayon on your lips. It’s an amazing in between. It also lasts very well with minimal reapplications or touch ups throughout the day. It’s very buildable, and works amazingly with most other lip products and colours! Definitely a repurchase and I recommend it.

reviews.review_title: Best lip liners on the market
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally the one of the few lip liners worth purchasing is Make Up Forever. I have majority of the colors and every time I purchase a different brand, I regret it because they just don't stay the same.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I would have never thought this color would work for me with my dark brown eyes and almost black hair but it does.  Creamy formula but wish it lasted longer.  I use NARS or givenchy to set.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased Wherever Walnut and Anywhere Caffeine: Am so impressed! Comfortable, glides smooth and doesn't emphasize texture around lip edges, beautiful colors, and they sharpen easily so the tip is always precise. Will repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite lip liner ever, I buy it over and over again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing.. the best lip liner I’ve ever used. I put this on before work at 8 AM and when I took my makeup off at 8 PM, it still looked perfect. It also glides on your lips so easily. Some other brands I feel like it’s way more effort. How?! I definitely want to get more colors!

reviews.review_text: My wedding makeup artist had first used this product (and in this particular shade) on my lips, and I was obsessed. The texture is interesting. The product glides on, is super pigmented, but feels dry on. It is such a flattering shade though and boy does it LAST. I mean the name of the brand is Make Up Forever, lol. You can obviously layer a balm or gloss over it, but it will reduce the longevity. It is so easy to work with and great as an everyday lippie overall!

reviews.review_text: Omg this is the most flattering lip liner shade. It is a staple and goes well with almost any colour gloss or lipstick over! I just wish it didn't need to be sharpened.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Color is beautiful. Very smoothly glides on your lips. Brown girl friendly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color. Seems like this lip pencil is going to last for awhile I’ve been using it three weeks and haven’t had to sharpen it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have never found a more perfect shade for freckles, eyeliner, tight lining, nose contouring, lip contouring… the list goes ONNNN

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was my favourite and I lost it after using it for only 5 times 🫠 I need to get it again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So good omg best formula ever. I’d recommend swatching shades in person as it’s hard to tell online

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the shade and the lasting power of this lip liner, however, smells like a colored pencil if that bothers you lol and I don’t know if it out ranks my Rare Beauty lip liners for the price! I’m still enjoying it though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this pencil liner in this color. Nice nude but does not disappear and makes my lips pop.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 610 Versatile Chestnut - Warm Chocolate Brown (Not suitable for use on eyes)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best lip liners ever. Stop your hunt. These are it. I got Wherever Walnut and Versatile Chestnut. They are my 2 go to liners. I also picked up Limitless brown but unfortunately it's too dark for my skin tone. Will try endless cacao next.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Liked the way it glides. Creamy. Did not sharp well at all for me. The lady at Sephora did show me the sharpener that works for it but I still decided to return

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried these liners and wow soooo good. The best. The pigmentation. The staying power. The formula. Yup these are my go to liners. I have wherever walnut, versatile chestnut and now limitless brown. Limitless brown was a bit too dark for me. But the other 2 shades are perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice but wasn’t impressed. I couldn’t justify the price when i already had pencils that looked very close. Overall the product is good but i think there are pencils that are just as good (maybe better) at lower price points. If price is notba factor i sont think you would be disappointed. Its a nice shade

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Like the color. Like how easy it is to apply. Makes me happy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best lip liner ever! It’s such a nice cool toned brown and helps contour lips perfectly. If you’re into cool toned lip liners I recommend this one :)

reviews.review_title: Beautiful color but just okay formula
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color but the formula was just okay. Drying on the lips as a liner or fill in color. Definitely works better as an eyeliner. Would have loved it to be a little creamier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cute buy a cheaper product will work just as good, not as creamy as I thought

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wherever walnut is a nice neutral shade, and the texture of the lipliner is soft and smooth. I would recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this brown color. I can pare it with so many nudes !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can see why wherever walnut is a popular shade. It’s the perfect lip liner for olive skin tone and it goes with any look. I’m obsessed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the perfect color! absolutely love this for everyday natural. the best “ your lips but better shade”. would recommend to anyone. 10/10
this lip liner honestly impressed me so much! it’s very smooth upon application and will not move!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: the best lipliner i’ve ever used!! so easy to apply, blends out well, lasts forever 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great neutral lip liner. Lasts a very long time. I use it with a few different nude to pink shade lip gloss. I love this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this pencil. It applies so smoothly and is an incredible color. I feel like it smudges more than my other lip liners though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE! This lip liner is top tier and lasts forever. Couldn’t ask for much more in a lip liner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the color but can not wear it with lipgloss because the color just rubs off. Wish it had better staying power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This goes on really smooth and wears beautifully. Anywhere Caffeine is an excellent neutral. It's a go-to when I'm going out to dinner because I know it'll last better than most lip pencils. Not dry feeling, but I typically wear it under a gloss or a tinted lip balm. Bought an extra so I have one on my vanity and one in my purse at all times :)

reviews.review_title: A must have liner for medium-toned skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m obsessed with this liner and I’m so happy I finally found a natural shade that isn’t too cool toned or too pink. I got the endless cacao which was obviously very cool toned but I can throw on this shade with gloss and no makeup and look natural!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to lip liner for sure out of all Sephora liners I’ve tried this one seems to stay the best. The only reason I rate it 4, instead of 5 is that if you don’t set it with spray (duh, I know) it will not stay as long but it still lasts a while if I forget!!

reviews.review_title: Don't believe the hype-- Rimmel is better
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don't understand the hype. These pencils were horrible. They felt like No 2 pencils.  I had to return. I'm sticking with Rimmel-- so creamy and drugstore.  Also don't know what I was thinking about purchasing Wherever Walnut and Everywhere caffeine. They did not show up on my light-medium South Asian skintone (note to self, stop watching videos made by white influencers).

reviews.review_title: Love this for every day lip liner ￼
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: 10/10 lip liner. Universally flattering and will certainly buy again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very cream lip liner blend in beautiful in the lips and nice in precise

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far the best lip liner I ever use . Creamy and easy to work on . The colour match my lip colour perfectly . I will buy more shades definitely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Neutral that goes with all my lip shades and glosses

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect as a lip liner, goes great with all my lip colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve repurchased endless cacao so many times over the years. THE perfect cool toned brown.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 610 Versatile Chestnut - Warm Chocolate Brown (Not suitable for use on eyes)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVEEEE this lip liner shade, so easy to apply! I do find it lasts less than other lip liners but it’s beautiful regardless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the creamiest lip liner ever! The limitless brown is a  true rich brown shade and looks amazing on two toned lips. For the longest time I thought nothing could beat the NYX lip liner but this one has become a staple for me.  me.Itglides like

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using for years parking just with a lip gloss. The color matches my natural lip color so I can do a little over lining and then just apply a shiny lip gloss. Very natural and makes lips look bigger.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color is this perfect deep dark brown, and the pencil is smooth and easy to use. I typically hate wooden pencils because I’m always afraid of little splinters, but this one sharpens like a gem. The formula is creamy and it’s easy to use around my eyes.

reviews.review_title: Good lip pencil but doesn’t last on my lip
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy this lip pencil, the colour anywhere caffeine is pretty but I don’t find it lasts well on my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: wherever walnut you are simply that girl. best lip liner ever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful formula and color is the perfect natural lip shade!

reviews.review_title: Beautiful application and worth the money
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m new to lip liners but I’m loving this one so far. Blends super easily!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are wonderful liners.  They last, are easy to use, multi-purpose and the colours are stunning.  Do not be afraid of the darker ones - very flattering!

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colour wherever walnut is my favourite nude/ natural lip liner. I will absolutely be repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the color Up and Down Tan which is fine for a lip liner but I don’t see myself using this color for brows or eyeliner so I feel this color isn’t as versatile as some of the others may be.  The formula is also a little dry and tugs a little.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love it it’s soft and glades nicely on the lips

reviews.review_title: Review for lip liner shade: Anywhere Caffeine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect coloured lip pencil. Goes with anything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this lip liner is my HOLY GRAILL!! i love this so much its smooth, lasts basically all day and this shade is a good neutral tone thats suitable for warm and cool tones 😍

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite lipliner and favorite shade. It’s long lasting and the perfect nude/brown color for an everyday look with some lipstick or gloss to top it off. I pair it with charlotte tilbury’s pillow talk lipstick and a gloss and I love it. It lasts half a day at least. Highly recommend. It’s also cool that you can use it as an eyeliner too although I haven’t tried that yet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect match for my red hair. Every other brand is way too brown but the artist colour line has some amazing reds for brows.

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was a gift for my GF and she loved it. Made her feel special.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best lip liner. Applies smoothly and lasts a long time compared to other liners!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product I realized it is a bit difficult to apply to your eyelid. Once applied it did stay on there pretty good. But like stated before it was difficult.

reviews.review_title: A must have in your make-up collection...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful nude peachy brown everyone is looking for. It can go with so many different shades.  Love the creaminess of this pencil.  Hands down one of my new favs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lip liner. Application is smooth. Color Is beautiful.  Goes with everything.  Staying power is great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful lip liner. I love that it can be used for multiple things. It stays on all day and has a soft texture that makes this glide smoothly. 100% recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this pencil and color  Doesn’t last all day but I haven’t found a smooth pencil like this one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this pencil. The formula is soft and creamy. The colour is gorgeous!!! 100% recommend.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 610 Versatile Chestnut - Warm Chocolate Brown (Not suitable for use on eyes)
